doc:
Ray Eberle https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ray_Eberle 0 Raymond Eberle (January 19, 1919 – August 25, 1979) was a vocalist during the Big Band Era, making his name with the Glenn Miller Orchestra. His elder brother, Bob Eberly, sang with the Jimmy Dorsey Orchestra. Raymond_Eberle ( January_19_,_1919 – August_25_,_1979 ) was a_vocalist during the_Big_Band_Era , making his_name with the_Glenn_Miller_Orchestra . His_elder_brother , Bob_Eberly , sang with the_Jimmy_Dorsey_Orchestra .
